title: ICYMI - Mary Frances Berry on "History Teaches Us to Resist" and the Power of Protest
itunes:title: ICYMI - Mary Frances Berry on "History Teaches Us to Resist" and the Power of Protest
description:
Historian Mary Frances Berry discusses misconceptions about Martin Luther King Jr., the essential role of protests in politics and her book "History Teaches Us to Resist."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
